original_text: They shall lick the dust like a serpent, they shall move out of their holes like worms of the earth: they shall be afraid of the Lord our God, and shall fear because of thee.
korean_text: 그들이 뱀처럼 티끌을 핥으며 땅에 기는 벌레처럼 떨며 그 좁은 구멍에서 나와서 두려워하며 우리 하나님 여호와께로 돌아와서 주로 말미암아 두려워하리이다

sentences.original_text: They shall lick the dust like a serpent
they shall move out of their holes like worms of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅의 벌레처럼 구멍에서 나올 것이며

sentences.original_text: they shall be afraid of the Lord our God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리 하나님 여호와를 두려워할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall fear because of thee
